parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds new submenu entry into item on given path. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuAdd]] [idc, path, text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuAdd]] [path, text]</value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Path where the items should be added  </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> text: [[String]] - Displayed name for the entry </value></part><part><name>Alternative Parameter23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Index of the item  </value></part><part><name>Alternative Return Value</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuAdd]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[], "Custom Tools"];<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Add new entry at the top level to the menu strip in [[Eden Editor]]</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[menuDelete]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
